text: @realDonaldTrump Omg....we already know how stupid you are, quit throwing it in our faces. We are barely holding on until Nov. when real leaders can take over, and we can eject you and your misfit enablers out of the @WhiteHouse #TrumpIsAnIdiot #TrumpIsALaughingStock #TrumpIsNotADoctor #COVID19
